definition: (American football) a position on the line of scrimmage, bring to an end or halt
details:
noun
- (American football) a position on the line of scrimmage
= example: (American football) a position on the line of scrimmage
= synonyms: tackle
- the part you are expected to play
= example: the part you are expected to play
- a piece of cloth that is left over after the rest has been used or sold
= synonyms: oddment, remainder, remnant
- a final part or section
= example: a final part or section
- the state of affairs that a plan is intended to achieve and that (when achieved) terminates behavior intended to achieve it
= example: the state of affairs that a plan is intended to achieve and that (when achieved) terminates behavior intended to achieve it
= synonyms: goal
- the last section of a communication
= synonyms: conclusion
- the concluding parts of an event or occurrence
= example: the concluding parts of an event or occurrence
= synonyms: last, final stage
- a boundary marking the extremities of something
= example: a boundary marking the extremities of something
- either extremity of something that has length
= example: either extremity of something that has length
= synonyms: terminal
- the surface at either extremity of a three-dimensional object
= example: the surface at either extremity of a three-dimensional object
- one of two places from which people are communicating to each other
= example: one of two places from which people are communicating to each other
- (football) the person who plays at one end of the line of scrimmage
= example: (football) the person who plays at one end of the line of scrimmage
- a final state
= example: a final state
= synonyms: destruction
- the point in time at which something ends
= example: the point in time at which something ends
= synonyms: ending
verb
- bring to an end or halt
= example: bring to an end or halt
= synonyms: terminate
- put an end to
= example: put an end to
= synonyms: lift
- have an end, in a temporal, spatial, or quantitative sense
= synonyms: finish
- be the end of
= synonyms: terminate
